body_html:
So in the end it's probably an issue with the Conda packages metadata, I managed to install the py36_5-cu80 release via the direct https address but conda80 conflicts with it:

Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment /home/stepelu/conda3/envs/py3env:

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

    cuda80:  1.0-0             soumith

The following packages will be DOWNGRADED due to dependency conflicts:

    pytorch: 0.1.11-py35_5cu80 soumith [cuda80] --> 0.1.11-py360_4cu80 soumith [cuda80]

Hopefully that helped to nail down the exact issue.

body:
So in the end it's probably an issue with the Conda packages metadata, I managed to install the py36_5-cu80 release via the direct https address but conda80 conflicts with it:

```
Fetching package metadata ...........
Solving package specifications: .

Package plan for installation in environment /home/stepelu/conda3/envs/py3env:

The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

    cuda80:  1.0-0             soumith

The following packages will be DOWNGRADED due to dependency conflicts:

    pytorch: 0.1.11-py35_5cu80 soumith [cuda80] --> 0.1.11-py360_4cu80 soumith [cuda80]
```

Hopefully that helped to nail down the exact issue.
